alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Aroostook County through 515 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dudley Township, or 13 miles northwest of Houlton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bridgewater, Smyrna, Dudley Township, Littleton, Monticello, Blaine, Dudley and Saint Croix. This includes US Highway 1 between Monticello and Bridgewater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
